popup.title: Front Observation Deck
popup.description: An observation deck where one has a sweeping view of the magnificence of the Golden Hour, and will be the generator of romantic memories for countless lovers in the foreseeable future.

popup.title: Dream Jigsaw
popup.description: A tool used for building dreams. These puzzles are utilized to imprint objects into the Dreamweaver's memories, bringing them to life within the dream world.

popup.title: Rooftop Garden
popup.description: A rooftop garden with a nice view. It's obvious that Penacony's Dreamweavers have extreme obsessions when it comes to the heights of buildings.

popup.title: Hanu's Adventure
popup.description:
An immersive dream game developed by Clock Studios.
In this game, players assume the role of the hero Hanu and engage in the animated world of Clockie, ultimately defeating the arch-villain named Boss Stone.

markers.icon: File:Icon Map Formidable Foe.png

popup.title: Dream Jigsaw
popup.description: A tool used for building dreams. These puzzles are utilized to imprint objects into the Dreamweaver's memories, bringing them to life within the dream world.

popup.title: Dream Ticker
popup.description: The Sweet Dreams Troupe, previously portraying Clockie, is currently experiencing physical and mental malfunctions that require repair.

popup.title: Dreamweaver Plaza
popup.description: A place where Dreamweavers can show off their capabilities — in physical terms. This is a place where artists and engineers can set off group brawls at any time when they disagree with each other.

popup.title: Verdant Manager's "Great Tree"
popup.description: A great tree still waiting to be built and adorned with a nest. A place where Origami Birds gather.

popup.title: The Family's Construction Authority
popup.description: Members of The Family monitor and oversee the construction of a new city in the Dreamscape. It can be understood as the stakeholder's office.

popup.title: Dream Jigsaw
popup.description: A tool used for building dreams. These puzzles are utilized to imprint objects into the Dreamweaver's memories, bringing them to life within the dream world.

popup.title: Psychic Detective
popup.description: Woolsey, a member of the Bloodhound Family, is not only dedicated to his duties but also exceptionally helpful. As long as you can provide enough Aideen Tokens, he will gladly share every detail of guests' actions in the Dreamscape with you.

markers.icon: File:Icon Map Psychic Detective.png

popup.title: Golden Hour
popup.description: The most prosperous "Moment" in Penacony, showcasing an entire city bathed in luxury. Here, melodies and merry-making never cease, and feasts continue evermore unto eternity.

popup.title: The Trees At Peace
popup.description: Adventure Mission start location

popup.title: Firefly
popup.description: Appears after completing [[Trailblaze Mission]] ''[[Gentleness, the Name of Nocturne]]''.

popup.description: Use {{Nowrap|{{Item|"Calm" Gear|x=1}}}} to unlock. After the mission, moves to the Dream's Edge entrance.
